attributes.action: Make playing music via the load speaker an offence and actively encourge mobile phone networks to stop selling them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When you use public transport, they are people who insist playing they music via a loud speaker.  This is annoying to the people that also are using the service.

All we ask is for this to be made illegal or for the mobile phone companies to stop making / selling them.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
